Class Coven

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • Coven
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Coven
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class that represents the coven. It covers most of the program functionability It's a Thread class
    Author:
    marcu

      • run

        public void run()
        We start the thread that resets the coven ingredients every 10 seconds. we also print the ingredients present in the coven every 5 seconds This function represents the thread
